source.author: Messina, A., Walsh, N.G., Hoebee, S.E., Green, P.T.
source.title: A revision of Olearia section asterotriche (Asteraceae: Asterae).
source.citation: Modified from: Messina, A., Walsh, N.G., Hoebee, S.E., Green, P.T. (2014). A revision of Olearia section asterotriche (Asteraceae: Asterae).. Australian Systematic Botany 27:199-240.

leads.lead_text: Leaves broad-elliptic to broad-obovate, not more than 2 times as long as wide; Mount Langi Ghiran
Leaves more or less linear or oblong, more than 2 times as long as wide; southern Victoria
Leaf margins strongly recurved or revolute, making leaves appear stiff and somewhat entire, never strongly lobed; Grampians
Leaves usually flaccid, margins flat or weakly recurved, lobed; south of the Dividing Range east of Melbourne and near Portland
